text: Neuzheli posle etikh yavnykh znameniy, dokazyvayushchikh, chto Allakh odin zasluzhivayet pokloneniya i chto, krome Nego, net boga, nekotoryye poklonyayutsya idolam, kotoryye ne mogut prinesti im ni vreda, ni pol'zy. Takim obrazom, nevernyye pomogayut shaytanu. On sbivayet ikh s pryamogo puti i vvodit v zabluzhdeniye. Neveruyushchiye svoim mnogobozhiyem pomogayut shaytanu protiv istiny, k kotoroy Allakh prizyvayet ikh
